channel.title: Linux on Bajo el teclado
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Bajo el teclado

item.title: Hack The Box: Shared Writeup | Medium
item.description: Hack The Box: Shared Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the medium difficulty machine “Shared” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.250.135 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.250.135 -> [22,80,443] $ nmap -p22,80,443 -sCV 10.129.250.135 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-07 13:22 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.250.135 Host is up (0.

item.title: Hack The Box: FormulaX Writeup | Hard
item.description: Hack The Box: FormulaX Writeup TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.230.190 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.230.190 -> [22,80] $ nmap -p22,80 -sCV 10.129.230.190 -Pn -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-07-31 18:19 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.230.190 Host is up (0.038s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.9p1 Ubuntu 3ubuntu0.6 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 256 5f:b2:cd:54:e4:47:d1:0e:9e:81:35:92:3c:d6:a3:cb (ECDSA) |_ 256 b9:f0:0d:dc:05:7b:fa:fb:91:e6:d0:b4:59:e6:db:88 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http nginx 1.

item.title: Hack The Box: WifineticTwo Writeup | Medium
item.description: Hack The Box: WifineticTwo Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the medium difficulty machine “WifineticTwo” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Initial Enumeration Port Scanning First, we perform a TCP port scan to discover open ports and services. 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.11 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 3072 48:ad:d5:b8:3a:9f:bc:be:f7:e8:20:1e:f6:bf:de:ae (RSA) | 256 b7:89:6c:0b:20:ed:49:b2:c1:86:7c:29:92:74:1c:1f (ECDSA) |_ 256 18:cd:9d:08:a6:21:a8:b8:b6:f7:9f:8d:40:51:54:fb (ED25519) 8080/tcp open http-proxy Werkzeug/1.
